sources.title: Porky's Romance (1937)
sources.description: The introduction cartoon for Petunia Pig deals with Porky’s courtship with her. Once he’s won her hand in marriage, he fantasizes about his future with her, which doesn’t seem very appealing.  1995 Computer Colorized Version.

metadata.Plot: The introduction cartoon for Petunia Pig deals with Porky's courtship with her. Once he's won her hand in marriage, he fantasizes about his future with her, which doesn't seem very appealing.
metadata.Actors: Joe Dougherty, Mel Blanc, Billy Bletcher
